dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset consists of grayscale images of handwritten digits, each of size 28x28 pixels, and contains 10 classes corresponding to the digits 0-9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Han Xiao
Kashif Rasul
Roland Vollgraf
dcterms:description: FashionMNIST is a dataset consisting of grayscale images of clothing items, each of size 28x28 pixels, and contains 10 classes representing different types of clothing.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST

dcterms:description: The SVHN dataset consists of color images of house numbers taken from Google Street View, each of size 32x32 pixels, and contains 10 classes corresponding to the digits 0-9.
dcterms:title: Street View House Numbers (SVHN)

dcterms:creator: Alex Krizhevsky
Geoffrey Hinton
dcterms:description: CIFAR-10 is a dataset containing 60,000 color images in 10 classes, with each image being 32x32 pixels in size.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10
